required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Early Warning Systems, Risk of Early Clinical Deterioration
clinical_study.official_title: If Early Warning Systems Were Used, Could the Risk of Early Clinical Deterioration be Predicted and Re-admission to Intensive Care Could be Prevented

brief_summary.textblock: Primary purpose of the study was to evaluate the relationship between "NEWS" and "VIEWS" scores of patients who were screened retrospectively, early clinical deterioration, return to intensive care and morbidity / mortality.

primary_outcome.measure: Number of patients who were taken back to intensive care unit due to early clinical deterioration
primary_outcome.description: Number of patients who were taken back to intensive care unit due to early clinical deterioration

intervention.description: The Vitalpac early warning score (ViEWS) is an early warning system aimed primarily at prediction of the first 24-hour mortality in emergency patients and has not been used to assess intensive care unit discharge.

study_pop.textblock: Patients over the age of 18 and discharged and admitted to intensive care in the first 24 hours

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- over 18 years
- patients who were taken back to the intensive care unit in the first 24 hours
Exclusion Criteria:
- under 18 years old,
- patients undergoing postoperative intensive care,
- pregnant women

reference.citation: Kaben A, Corrêa F, Reinhart K, Settmacher U, Gummert J, Kalff R, Sakr Y. Readmission to a surgical intensive care unit: incidence, outcome and risk factors. Crit Care. 2008;12(5):R123. doi: 10.1186/cc7023. Epub 2008 Oct 6.

results_reference.citation: Prytherch DR, Smith GB, Schmidt PE, Featherstone PI. ViEWS--Towards a national early warning score for detecting adult inpatient deterioration. Resuscitation. 2010 Aug;81(8):932-7. doi: 10.1016/j.resuscitation.2010.04.014.
McGinley A, Pearse RM. A national early warning score for acutely ill patients. BMJ. 2012 Aug 8;345:e5310. doi: 10.1136/bmj.e5310.
